com.eisgroup.javaexam.library

Interface Library


  • public interface Library
    Represents a library.

    • Method Detail

      • takeABook

        void takeABook(Book book)
        Adds a book to the library. Following constraints apply:
        • If a book already existsin a library, it is not added.
        Parameters:
        book - book to be added to the library

      • getNumberOfBooks

        int getNumberOfBooks()
        Returns:
        number of books in a library

      • findByTitle

        Book findByTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Finds a book in a library by its title.
        Parameters:
        title - book title to find
        Returns:
        book book if found, null otherwise

      • findByAuthor

        java.util.Collection<Book> findByAuthor(java.lang.String author)
        Parameters:
        author - book author
        Returns:
        all books from a specified author

      • getBooksSortedByPageCount

        java.util.Collection<Book> getBooksSortedByPageCount()
        Returns:
        all of the books sorted by page number from least to most pages
